value.title: DAX Fridays! #10: RANK/ TOPN with slicer
value.excerpt: In this video you will learn how to create a custom slicer that will rank your data based on the criteria that you specify, for example, Top 3, Top 5 and Top 10. value.excerpt: In today's #daxfridays video I will show you how to get selected or multiple values from a slicer.  To do that, we will use the following functiions: 1.
